column1: Uchi////Son provided a couple of complimentary items (maguro sashimi and goat cheese & machi cure) since I was unsure of what to get. Finally ended up on the jar jar duck (lots of unique smokey flavouring)
column2: brussel sprouts (caramelized in a vinegrette chili sauce
column7: melt in your mouth cross between Angus and Kobe beef)
column9: and fried milk (iced milk in a crunchy coating). Â
